sentences.sentence: UKRAINIANS FORCED TO FLEE THEIR HOMES AS KYIV SAYS RUSSIANS DELIBERATELY DESTROYED A MAJOR DAM UNLEASHING A WALL OF WATER ON SETTLEMENTS DOWNSTREAM.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: WHILE IT REMAINS UNCLEAR IF UKRAINE'S COUNTER-OFFENSIVE HAS BEGUN, KYIV SAYS ITS FORCES ARE SHIFTING TO OFFENSIVE ACTIONS IN SOME AREAS.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: AROUND HALF A MILLION PEOPLE ARE EXPECTED TO TAKE TO THE STREETS ACROSS FRANCE ON TUESDAY AGAINST THE GOVERNMENT'S CONTROVERSIAL PENSION REFORM. Around half a million people are expected to take to the streets across France on Tuesday against the government's controversial pension reform.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: In Kherson, it's all eyes on the river as people brace for flooding

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: after the destruction of a major dam up the Dnieper River.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The dam was holding back 18 million cubic meters of water in the Novokokovka reservoir. Now Ukrainians downstream are having to flee their homes. All the services are working. The DPR, the police, the military are all around.. The dam is in Russian hands and the Ukrainians accused them of deliberately filling the reservoir to the brim before destroying it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: EU and European ministers have condemned its destruction as a war crime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says it was a desperate and deliberate act of Russian sabotage aimed at thwarting its counteroffensive. Russia claims the damage was caused by Ukrainian bombardments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The attack on the Kharkovka Dam has provoked a wave of international condemnation,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: with most in the West blaming Russia. Chancellor Olaf Scholz described it as a new dimension to die eine Waffe internationaler Verurteilung verursacht, mit den meisten im Westen Russland zu verurteilen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Chancellor Olaf Scholz hat es als eine neue Dimension der Kriegssituation beschrieben. NATO-Chef Jens Stoltenberg hat auch gegen den Blast in einer Beratung mit NATO-Alliieren gesprochen. spoke out against the blast in a meeting with NATO allies. The destruction of the Khovka Dam today puts thousands of civilians at risk and causes severe environmental damage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This is an outrageous act which demonstrates once again the brutality of Russia's war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, EU Council President Charles Michel said the destruction of the dam clearly qualifies as a war crime, adding that Russia will be held accountable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In contrast, the Kremlin blames Ukraine, saying the dam was shelled in an act of sabotage. Ukraine has released this footage purporting to show attacks on Russian positions near Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Kyiv earlier maintained silence on its military activities, but has since announced that its forces are shifting to offensive actions in some areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Whether this amounts to the launch of its long-awaited counteroffensive remains unclear, but President Volodymyr Zelensky did reference Bakhmut in his nightly address.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I am grateful to every soldier, to all our defenders, to our defenders who gave us the news we were expecting. Bakhmut direction. Well done, soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian leader earlier welcomed Britain's Foreign Secretary James Cleverley to Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The pair discussed Ukraine's accession to NATO, with Cleverley saying Ukraine will win the war and can count on London's support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Moscow meanwhile has released its own footage claiming to show it repelling an attempted large-scale offensive by Ukrainian forces in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It says it killed 250 Ukrainian troops and destroyed tanks and other military vehicles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russian state television has also aired footage showing the destruction in border towns in southwest Russia's Belgorod region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Some observers see the attacks as part of Ukraine's efforts to distract Moscow and stretch its forces to help the counter-offensive succeed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Over the skies of Ukraine and Russia, drones of all kinds have become the arm of choice

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: in the defense against conventional weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They've graduated from being marginal tools used in reconnaissance missions to becoming a priority in warfare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Neither Ukraine nor Russia were really prepared for this war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Russia was behind its drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The war has been globalized by a push from the arms industry, which is developing new types of drones that are better adapted to strategies on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The skies above Ukraine, you don't just have Ukraine and Russia fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And these Turkish drones, as far as the Ukrainian push goes, these Turkish drones have been responsible for some of Ukraine's most deadly retaliatory strikes, from attacking oil depots within Russia to even the sinking of the Russian warship in the Black Sea.

sentences.sentence: Australia, America and the United Kingdom, they are actually working right now on AI-based drone swarms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The immediate future for drones lies in the expansion of models, contract manufacturers in different countries and even in the construction of new factories. Los proveedores de drones para Rusia en este momento están siendo Israel, Irán y no puedo asegurar todavía si están usando sistemas chinos. if Iran starts to build factories within Russia, and if Russia is able to build its own supply chain domestically that can pump out a high number of drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The E.U.'s annual Green Week has kicked off showcasing its climate projects and policies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Although the first meetings began on Saturday, the European Commission launched two days of debates and conferences in Brussels on Tuesday, the aim of which to achieve a climate neutral world. Political leaders present stressed the need to change mentalities and above all to involve citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We haven't done enough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We as leaders, we need to go deeper on regions and our cities and to talk with our citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Why?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Because sometimes we are talking so technical, so many technicalities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: If you do not express your word, your language according with their level of understanding Si vous n'exprimez pas votre langue, votre mot, en fonction de leur niveau d'entendu et de leur connexion avec les aspects concrets de leur vie.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Le monde corporate était aussi présent à la conférence, en défendant la balance qu'ils cherchent entre les profits et les commitments climatiques.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Je n'aime pas trop faire reposer la responsabilité sur les épaules des consommateurs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: J'aime bien qu'on prenne notre pleine responsabilité.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Nous, notre rôle, c'est de les aider à avoir une consommation plus responsable, parce que je pense que tout le monde a envie d'avoir une consommation responsable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
